Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: CONCLUSION : A single 10 - , 20 - , or 40 - micrograms / kg dose of granisetron was effective in controlling vomiting in 57 % to 60 % of patients who received cisplatin at doses greater than 81 mg / m2 and totally prevented vomiting in 40 % to 47 % of patients .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Vomiting (in response to cisplatin) |

The paragraph is about the effectiveness of granisetron in controlling and preventing vomiting in patients receiving cisplatin. Therefore, the disease entity mentioned in the paragraph is "vomiting in response to cisplatin."

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Vomiting (in response to cisplatin) |

The paragraph only mentions "vomiting" as a clear disease entity in response to the treatment "cisplatin." Therefore, other entities such as "doses," "micrograms," "kg," "mg," and "m2" do not refer to diseases and can be disregarded.
